item.title: Indian Markets Rebound From Six Weeks Of Losses; S&P Upgrades Credit Rating
item.description: Gains in tech, select financials and consumer durables offset weakness in metals, FMCG, and realty.

item.title: India Gets A Credit Rating Upgrade From S&P Global Driven By Economic Resilience
item.description: S&P Global has revised the rating to ‘BBB’ from ‘BBB-’ as policy continuity and strong infrastructure spending supports the country’s long-term growth...

item.title: Cisco Stock Edges Lower Premarket Despite Q4 Beat: Here’s Why

item.title: BEL Stock May Test ₹420–₹425 In The Short Term, Says SEBI Analyst Deepak Pal
item.description: A strong ₹76,000 crore order book and government defence push could lift the stock to ₹500 in the next 1–2 years, the analyst said.
